function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased dependence on digital platforms due to COVID-19, leading to social and cultural reformation","Impact":"Isolation, disconnection, and inequality for digital illiterate individuals","Mitigation":"Digital literacy programs, community outreach, and support services for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Online education platforms, digital communication tools, and virtual community engagement solutions","People":"Digital illiterate individuals, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, community organizations, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Proliferation of smart city technology and 6G may lead to increased surveillance and privacy concerns","Impact":"Invasion of privacy, lack of data security, and potential misuse of personal information","Mitigation":"Strong data protection regulations, privacy by design principles, and transparent data governance policies","Technologies":"Data encryption, blockchain technology, and privacy-enhancing technologies","People":"City residents, data subjects","Owner":"Government, technology companies, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Rapid advancements in ICT and wireless technologies may result in disparities in digital access and broadband speeds","Impact":"Digital divide, unequal access to opportunities and resources, and exacerbation of socioeconomic inequalities","Mitigation":"Infrastructure investment in underserved areas, affordable broadband programs, and digital inclusion initiatives","Technologies":"Fiber optics, satellite internet, and wireless broadband technologies","People":"Underserved communities, low-income households","Owner":"Telecommunication companies, government, non-profit organizations"}]}
